input.sentences: the group got take-out for the get-together .
they started the night by looking at photos from one couple 's recent vacation .
after enjoying the photos | they moved on to playing poker .
one friend pulled out a digital camera and the other began goofing off .
his girlfriend got annoyed with the silliness | and they got into a fight that ended the party .
output.sentences: A family enjoys their vacation while relaxing and eating a tv dinner.
Afterwards they sort out all of the photos that were taking a day before.
Consume with the daunting task of organizing the endless selfies, they decided to play poker and the losers have to buy pizza.
The young teen knows his girlfriend is on the brink of losing and he gives a her menacing grin.
While she returns with a frown he slams a full house play on the table and she is shocked.
